title: ahmazoo
author: ahmazoo
content: Hi sisters, I am a young man of twenty-three years old. I work in e-marketingThe oldest social networking services (increase followers, likes and views on all social media sites)speed in performanceAccuracy at workOur prices are for everyonePay via PayPalor bitcoinAll I want from you is a link to your pageIf you would like to inquire, send me a message

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Since you are a person with a background in marketing, the way you present yourself initially gives an impression of your professionalism, and unfortunately, you have shown the opposite. - You posted in the wrong board which means you didn't read the forum rules. - It is best to display your past experiences in a way that the user can verify. - It is better to write prices and a way to contact you, as the messages are limited (per hour) for beginners.

comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: Quote from: hugeblack on July 31, 2022, 07:10:24 PM - You posted in the wrong board which means you didn't read the forum rules.A new user of the forum may not know proper use of the boards as we do. So I will not give him discredit for it. He will learn.Quote- It is best to display your past experiences in a way that the user can verify.I take this. If a user is offering service then he at-least present it with some efforts. OP haven't put any effort at all. @ahmazoo, I would like to see some past work you did and details about your skills.
